channel.title: Google's new Audio transcriber for CC
channel.description: If you haven't noticed already, Youtube has added a new audio transcriber for videos on youtube. Its still in beta, and I applaud the effort, but most of the time its not even close. A lot of times it don't even make sense, and its quite funny. I recommend checking it out. If you see some funny lines add them below. I would start us out, but I don't have the time, I got midterms early in the morning tomorrow :frowning: .

item.title: Google's new Audio transcriber for CC
item.dc:creator: hercule_poirots_nuts

item.title: Google's new Audio transcriber for CC
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Well, a testimonial video I created for my company had some funky subtitles going on.

We make software for the print and packaging industry, and each time the words “packaging programs” was mentioned, it would transcribe to “space programs”.

I work for NASA now.

Read full topic
item.source: Google's new Audio transcriber for CC

item.description:
If you haven’t noticed already, Youtube has added a new audio transcriber for videos on youtube. Its still in beta, and I applaud the effort, but most of the time its not even close. A lot of times it don’t even make sense, and its quite funny. I recommend checking it out. If you see some funny lines add them below.
